title: Dogs vs Aliens
description: Dogs vs Aliens is a casual cute simulation game where your beloved pets have been kidnapped by evil aliens. It's time to rescue them and fight back! Evolve your dogs to defeat stronger enemies, free new companions, and collect unique resources to power up your furry defenders. To win the game, you need to save all the pets and send the aliens back to the Moon! Can you save all the dogs and defeat the alien invaders?
